âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Privacy-focused action execution only after death â€¢ Encrypted actions using age encryption â€¢ Vault integration for private key management â€¢ Multiple action execution methods (json_post, bulksms, mail)
ðŸ“– Summary: The dead-man-hand repository provides a dead-man-switch software solution designed with privacy in mind. It allows users to define actions that will be executed only when they are considered 'dead,' ensuring that these actions remain encrypted and confidential until that moment. The system integrates with Vault for secure key management and supports multiple action and probe methods.
